subject: Michael Moore on Oprah Tuesday
body:
Michael Moore on Oprah Tuesday


Michael Moore will appear on Oprah tomorrow, Tuesday, June 5, and will present, for the first time on television, scenes from his new film, "Sicko." Oprah will interview Michael about the movie and the attention it's receiving before its release (opening day everywhere is June 29).  The theme of Oprah's show is the one film you must see this summer -- "Sicko" -- and the one book you must read (Warwic McCarthy's "The Road"). Oprah loved Michael's film and wants to make health care for all one of her main missions this year.


So set your recorders for Oprah tomorrow, Tuesday!
